skills.name: Lightning Rush
skills.simple_desc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single enemy.
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 80% of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Shackle Breaker
skills.simple_desc: Consumes a portion of HP to deal Lightning DMG to a single enemy.
skills.desc: Consumes Arlan's HP equal to 15% of his Max HP to deal Lightning DMG equal to 252% of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy. If Arlan does not have sufficient HP, his HP will be reduced to 1 after using his Skill.

skills.name: Frenzied Punishment
skills.simple_desc: Deals massive Lightning DMG to a single enemy and Lightning DMG to enemies adjacent to it.
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 332% of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to 166% of Arlan's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

skills.name: Pain and Anger
skills.simple_desc: Increases DMG based on the current percentage of own HP lost.
skills.desc: Increases Arlan's DMG for every percent of HP below his Max HP, up to a max of 75% more DMG.

skills.name: Swift Harvest
skills.simple_desc: Attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals minor Lightning DMG to all enemies.
skills.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to 80% of Arlan's ATK to all enemies.

relic_sets.name: Band of Sizzling Thunder
relic_sets.desc: When the wearer uses their Skill, increases the wearer's ATK by 20% for 1 turn(s).

relic_sets.name: Inert Salsotto
relic_sets.desc: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 50% or higher, the wearer's Ultimate and follow-up attack DMG increases by 15%.

skills.name: Frost Thorn
skills.simple_desc: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single enemy.
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to 80% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Darting Ironthorn
skills.simple_desc: Deals Ice DMG to a single enemy and activates the Soulsteel Sync.
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to 192% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy and activates Soulsteel Sync for 1 turn.

skills.name: Amidst the Raining Bliss
skills.simple_desc: Increases Yanqing's CRIT Rate. Enhances "Soulsteel Sync" and deals massive Ice DMG to a single enemy.
skills.desc: Increases Yanqing's CRIT Rate by 60%. When Soulsteel Sync is active, increases Yanqing's CRIT DMG by an extra 45%. This buff lasts for one turn. Afterwards, deals Ice DMG equal to 315% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: One With the Sword
skills.simple_desc:
During Soulsteel Sync, reduces the chance of this character being attacked and increases their CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG. After attacking an enemy, there is a chance of launching a follow-up attack, dealing Ice DMG with a chance to Freeze the target.
Soulsteel Sync will be removed after this character receives damage.
skills.desc:
When Soulsteel Sync is active, Yanqing is less likely to be attacked by enemies. Yanqing's CRIT Rate increases by 18.8% and his CRIT DMG increases by 26%. After Yanqing attacks an enemy, there is a 57% fixed chance to perform a follow-up attack, dealing Ice DMG equal to 43% of Yanqing's ATK to the enemy, which has a 65% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn.
The Frozen target cannot take action and receives Additional Ice DMG equal to 43% of Yanqing's ATK at the beginning of each turn.
When Yanqing receives DMG, the Soulsteel Sync effect will disappear.

skills.name: The One True Sword
skills.simple_desc: After this character uses Technique, at the start of the next battle, increases the DMG dealt by this character to enemy targets whose HP is 50% or higher.
skills.desc: After using his Technique, at the start of the next battle, Yanqing deals 30% more DMG for 2 turn(s) to enemies whose current HP is 50% or higher.

relic_sets.name: Hunter of Glacial Forest
relic_sets.desc: After the wearer uses their Ultimate, their CRIT DMG increases by 25% for 2 turn(s).

relic_sets.name: Celestial Differentiator
relic_sets.desc: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 16%. When the wearer's current CRIT DMG reaches 120% or higher, after entering battle, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 60% until the end of their first attack.

skills.name: Shard Sword
skills.simple_desc: Deals minor Wind DMG to an enemy.
skills.desc: Deals 90% of Blade's ATK as Wind DMG to a target enemy.

skills.name: Hellscape
skills.simple_desc: Consumes HP to Enhance Basic ATK, and this turn does not end after this Skill is used.
skills.desc:
Consumes HP equal to 30% of Blade's Max HP to enter the Hellscape state.
When Hellscape is active, his Skill cannot be used, his DMG dealt increases by 33%, and his Basic ATK Shard Sword is enhanced to Forest of Swords for 3 turn(s).
If Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when he uses his Skill.
This Skill does not regenerate Energy. Using this Skill does not end the current turn.

skills.name: Death Sentence
skills.simple_desc: Sets current HP to 50% of Max HP, and deals massive Wind DMG to a single enemy and Wind DMG to adjacent targets.
skills.desc:
Sets Blade's current HP to 50% of his Max HP and deals Wind DMG to a single enemy equal to the sum of 36% of his ATK, 90% of his Max HP, and 90% of the tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle. At the same time, deals Wind DMG to adjacent targets equal to the sum of 14.4% of his ATK, 36% of his Max HP, and 36% of the tally of his HP loss in the current battle.
The tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle is capped at 90% of his Max HP. This value will be reset and re-accumulated after his Ultimate has been used.

skills.name: Shuhu's Gift
skills.simple_desc: When Blade's HP is lowered, he gains 1 stack of Charge. When maximum Charge stack is reached, Blade immediately deals Wind DMG to all enemies and restores HP. Then, all Charges are consumed.
skills.desc:
When Blade sustains DMG or consumes his HP, he gains 1 stack of Charge, stacking up to 5 times. A max of 1 Charge stack can be gained every time he is attacked.
When Charge stack reaches maximum, immediately launches a follow-up attack on all enemies, dealing Wind DMG equal to 38% of Blade's ATK plus 96% of his Max HP. At the same time, restores Blade's HP by 25% of his Max HP. After the follow-up attack, all Charges are consumed.

skills.name: Karma Wind
skills.simple_desc: Attacks the enemy. After entering combat, consumes own HP and deals Wind DMG to all enemies.
skills.desc:
Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering combat, consumes 20% of Blade's Max HP while dealing Wind DMG equal to 40% of his Max HP to all enemies.
If Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when this Technique is used.

skills.name: Forest of Swords
skills.simple_desc: Consumes HP and deals Wind DMG to an enemy, as well as minor Wind DMG to adjacent targets.
skills.desc:
Consumes HP equal to 10% of Blade's Max HP and deals Wind DMG equal to the sum of 36% of his ATK and 90% of his Max HP to a single enemy. In addition, deals Wind DMG equal to the sum of 14% of Blade's ATK and 36% of his Max HP to adjacent targets.
If Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when using Forest of Swords.
Forest of Swords cannot regenerate Skill Points.

relic_sets.name: Longevous Disciple
relic_sets.desc: When the wearer is hit or has their HP consumed by an ally or themselves, their CRIT Rate increases by 8% for 2 turn(s) and up to 2 stacks.

relic_sets.name: Rutilant Arena
relic_sets.desc: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 70% or higher, the wearer's Basic ATK and Skill DMG increase by 20%.

skills.name: Beneficent Lotus
skills.simple_desc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single enemy.
skills.desc: Uses a 2-hit attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 90% of Dan Heng  Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target.

skills.name: Dracore Libre
skills.simple_desc: Enhances the Basic ATK Beneficent Lotus to Transcendence, Divine Spear, or Fulgurant Leap.
skills.desc:
Enhances Basic ATK. Enhancements may be applied up to 3 times consecutively. Using this ability does not consume Skill Points and is not considered as using a Skill.
Enhanced once, Beneficent Lotus becomes Transcendence.
Enhanced twice, Beneficent Lotus becomes Divine Spear.
Enhanced thrice, Beneficent Lotus becomes Fulgurant Leap.
When using Divine Spear or Fulgurant Leap, starting from the fourth hit, 1 stack of Outroar is gained before every hit. Each stack of Outroar increases Dan Heng  Imbibitor Lunae's CRIT DMG by 9.0%, for a max of 4 stacks. These stacks last until the end of his turn.

skills.name: Azure's Aqua Ablutes All
skills.simple_desc: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to a single enemy, deals Imaginary DMG to adjacent targets, and gains 2 Squama Sacrosancta, which can offset Dan Heng  Imbibitor Lunae's consumption of skill points. Consuming Squama Sacrosancta is considered equivalent to consuming skill points.
skills.desc:
Uses a 3-hit attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 240% of Dan Heng  Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target. At the same time, deals Imaginary DMG equal to 112% of Dan Heng  Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to adjacent targets. Then, obtains 2 Squama Sacrosancta.
It's possible to hold up to 3 Squama Sacrosancta, which can be used to offset Dan Heng  Imbibitor Lunae's consumption of skill points. Consuming Squama Sacrosancta is considered equivalent to consuming skill points.

skills.name: Righteous Heart
skills.simple_desc: Increases DMG for every hit dealt. This effect is stackable and lasts until the end of this character's turn.
skills.desc: After each hit dealt during an attack, Dan Heng  Imbibitor Lunae gains 1 stack of Righteous Heart, increasing his DMG by 8.1%. This effect can stack up to 6 time(s), lasting until the end of his turn.

skills.name: Heaven-Quelling Prismadrakon
skills.simple_desc: Enters the Leaping Dragon state. Attacking will cause this character to move forward rapidly for a set distance and attack all enemies touched. After entering combat via attacking enemies, deals Imaginary DMG to all enemies, and gains 1 Squama Sacrosancta.
skills.desc: After using his Technique, Dan Heng  Imbibitor Lunae enters the Leaping Dragon state for 20 seconds. While in the Leaping Dragon state, using his attack enables him to move forward rapidly for a set distance, attacking all enemies he touches and blocking all incoming attacks. After entering combat via attacking enemies in the Leaping Dragon state, Dan Heng  Imbibitor Lunae deals Imaginary DMG equal to 120% of his ATK to all enemies, and gains 1 Squama Sacrosancta.

skills.name: Transcendence
skills.simple_desc: Unleashes 3 hits in this attack and deals Imaginary DMG to a single enemy target.
skills.desc: Uses a 3-hit attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 234% of Dan Heng  Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target.

skills.name: Divine Spear
skills.simple_desc: Unleashes 5 hits in this attack to deal massive Imaginary DMG to a single enemy and minor Imaginary DMG to adjacent targets. For each of the last 2 hits, obtains 1 stack of Outroar just before the hit, increasing CRIT DMG.
skills.desc: Uses a 5-hit attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 190% of Dan Heng  Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target. From the fourth hit onward, simultaneously deals Imaginary DMG equal to 30% of Dan Heng  Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to adjacent targets.

skills.name: Fulgurant Leap
skills.simple_desc: Unleashes 7 hits in this attack to deal massive Imaginary DMG to a single enemy and Imaginary DMG to adjacent targets. For each of the last 4 hits, obtains 1 stack of Outroar just before the hit, increasing CRIT DMG.
skills.desc: Uses a 7-hit attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 250% of Dan Heng  Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target. From the fourth hit onward, simultaneously deal Imaginary DMG equal to 90% of Dan Heng  Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to adjacent targets.

light_cone.name: On the Fall of an Aeon

relic_sets.name: Wastelander of Banditry Desert
relic_sets.desc: When attacking debuffed enemies, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 10%, and their CRIT DMG increases by 20% against Imprisoned enemies.

relic_sets.name: Rutilant Arena
relic_sets.desc: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 70% or higher, the wearer's Basic ATK and Skill DMG increase by 20%.
